statements: SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_id, lab_test_results FROM patient_data ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, imaging_studies FROM patient_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE lab_test_results->>'result' = 'Positive';
SELECT patient_id, patient_reports FROM patient_data LIMIT 3 OFFSET 1;
SELECT patient_id, lab_test_results FROM patient_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE lab_test_results @> '{"status": "normal"}';
SELECT patient_id, imaging_studies FROM patient_data ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_reports FROM patient_data WHERE patient_reports->>'date' > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients, MAX(patient_id) AS max_patient_id FROM patient_data;
SELECT * FROM lab_tests WHERE test_id = 1;
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM lab_tests ORDER BY test_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM lab_tests WHERE patient_id = 100 AND test_result = 'Negative';
SELECT patient_id, test_name, test_result FROM lab_tests WHERE test_result LIKE '%Positive%';
SELECT study_type, result_path FROM imaging_studies WHERE study_id > 3 ORDER BY study_id DESC;
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM lab_tests;
SELECT * FROM lab_tests WHERE test_result = 'Positive';
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM lab_tests WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM lab_tests ORDER BY test_name ASC;
SELECT study_type, result_path FROM imaging_studies WHERE study_type = 'MRI' ORDER BY study_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM lab_tests;
SELECT test_name, test_date FROM lab_tests ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT test_id, test_name FROM lab_tests WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM lab_tests WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(test_id) AS num_tests FROM lab_tests GROUP BY patient_id HAVING num_tests > 2;
SELECT test_id, test_name, patient_id, test_date FROM lab_tests WHERE patient_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM imaging_studies WHERE study_type = 'X-ray' ORDER BY study_date DESC;
SELECT study_id, study_type, patient_id, study_date, image_url FROM imaging_studies WHERE patient_id = 54321 AND study_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, report_date, report_text FROM patient_reports ORDER BY report_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT test_id, test_name, patient_id, test_date FROM lab_tests WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM lab_tests;
SELECT patient_id, test_date, test_name FROM lab_tests ORDER BY test_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM imaging_studies WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT report_text FROM patient_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT care_type, care_notes FROM patient_care WHERE care_date < '2022-03-15' ORDER BY care_date DESC;
SELECT test_id, test_name, test_result FROM lab_tests WHERE test_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM imaging_studies WHERE patient_id = 1001 AND study_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT patient_id, report_text, report_date FROM patient_reports WHERE LENGTH(report_text) > 100 ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT care_type, care_notes FROM patient_care WHERE patient_id = 1002 AND care_date < '2022-05-01';

SELECT pt.patient_id, pt.test_name, cs.imaging_type, pr.report_text FROM lab_tests pt JOIN imaging_studies cs ON pt.patient_id = cs.patient_id JOIN patient_reports pr ON pt.patient_id = pr.patient_id WHERE pt.test_date >= '2022-01-01' AND cs.study_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY pt.test_date DESC, cs.study_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM LabTests;
SELECT patient_id, test_name, test_date FROM ImagingStudies WHERE study_type='MRI';
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT physician_name, specialty FROM Physicians ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT report_type, report_content FROM PatientReports WHERE patient_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM LabTests WHERE test_result = 'positive';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT physician_name, specialty, experience_years FROM Physicians WHERE experience_years > 10 ORDER BY physician_name ASC;
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM LabTests UNION SELECT study_type, study_result FROM ImagingStudies;
SELECT patient_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC;
